description: The homepage should be as minimalist as possible, when no destinations are selected
name: Homepage

steps.name: page node title should be "[Loft Terral] Where do we go?"

elements.name: A search bar should be available when no destination are selected

steps.name: searchBar placeholder should be updated in time (at T = 0ms, should be "I want to go to... London")
